GSD.product_version: versions from v4.19 to before v5.15.58
GSD.description:
ip: Fix data-races around sysctl_ip_fwd_update_priority.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.58 by commit 351f81f7d7185d18a9ff76f8f8c2fa8c4eea563b, it was introduced in version v4.19 by commit 432e05d328921c68c35bfdeff7d7b7400b8e3d1a. For more details please see the references link.
